definition[0]: to tie someoneâ€™s arms, legs etc very firmly with rope so that they cannot move
example[0]: They trussed up their victim and left him for dead.
definition[1]: to prepare a chicken, duck etc for cooking by tying its legs and wings into position
definition[2]: a special belt worn to support a hernia (=medical problem that affects the muscles below your stomach)
definition[3]: a frame supporting a roof or bridge
